description: Italian prosecutors had accused four Egyptian officers of the murder of a Cambridge student in 2016.
title: Giulio Regeni: Italy condemns Egypt for ruling out charges against police
title_page: Giulio Regeni: Italy condemns Egypt for ruling out charges against police - BBC News
maintext: His body was discovered on 3 February in a ditch by the side of a road. His mother told the Italian parliament in 2018 that her son's body was so disfigured that she was only able to identify him by the tip of his nose.
